title: Herath scripts perfect farewell for Jayawardene
content: Sri Lanka 320 (Tharanga 92, Junaid 5-87) and 282 (Sangakkara 59, Jayawardene 54, Wahab 3-76, Ajmal 3-89) beat Pakistan 332 (Sarfraz 103, Herath 9-127) and 165 (Sarfraz 55, Herath 5-57) by 105 runs It took Sri Lanka just under an hour on the fifth morning to wrap up the Pakistan innings and kick off the…
